      <div class="top-spaced bottom-spaced">
	
		<h1><span class="begin">We<br/>Are</span><span>Back in Lyon</span></h1>

<div>
After <a href="http://www.www2017.com.au/">www2017</a> in Perth, Western Australia, and following the success of <a href="http://www2012.org">www2012</a>, the Université de Lyon, the City of Lyon and the Digital League are proud to host www2018 rebranded as &#8220;The Web Conference 2018&#8221;.
</div>

<div class="stringmanus stringspaced stringmedium">Let’s build the Web of Tomorrow</div>

<div class="top-spaced">&nbsp;</div>

<div class="register"><a href="/registration/">Register Now!</a></div>

<div id="roadmap">
<h1><a href="/about/important-dates/"><span class="begin">The<br/>Shortened</span><span>Roadmap</span></a></h1>
<p>(provisional)</p>
<div>  05 April 2017  <p>Beginning of online registrations</p></div>
<div>  20 June 2017  <p>Publication of joint Call For Paper</p></div>
<div>  28 February 2018  <p><strong>Changed deadline: Early-bird registrations deadline</strong></p></div>
<div>  26 March 2018  <p>Beginning of late registrations</p></div>
<div>  17 April 2018  <p>End of online registrations</p></div>
<div>  23 &#8211; 27 April 2018  <p>The Web Conference 2018</p></div>
</div>

<div class="read-more"><a href="/important-dates/">See all dates</a></div>

<h1 class="bigtop-spaced"><a href="https://webcomelyon.fr/en/home/"><span class="begin">The Web<br/>Conference</span><span>OFF</span></a></h1>

<div class="leftcolLogo">
<a href="https://webcomelyon.fr/en/home/"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/ThisSite/webcomelyon.png" alt = "WebCome Lyon" title="WebCome Lyon"/></a>
</div>

<div>
From July 2017 to the end of 2018, the economic, cultural, educational, social and citizen actors in Lyon area are invited to propose events for “all public” around the theme of the Web, which will constitute the “<strong><a class="noborder" href="https://webcomelyon.fr/en/home/">OFF</a></strong>” of <strong>The Web Conference</strong>.
</div>

<!-- Organizers Université de Lyon IW3C2 Clust'R Numérique
     Partners Grand-Lyon Only-Lyon Région-Rhône-Alpes Imaginove Cuisine du web
     Sponsors
     Sponsor Exhibitor -->

	      </div>
    </div></div>
      
    <div class="rightcol toppart"><div class="innerrightcol">
      <div class="subtitle">Bridging natural and artificial intelligence worldwide</div>
      <div>
        <div class="rightblock"><h1><a href="/keynotes/"><span class="begin">Our<br/>Inspiring</span><span>Keynote speakers</span></a></h1><div class="spacer right-lefthalf"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/Keynotes/Luciano-Floridi.jpg" title="Luciano Floridi photo : courtesy of Ian Scott – 2016" alt="Luciano Floridi"/>

<div>
Welcome to our keynote speaker <strong>Luciano Floridi</strong> who will present "<strong>The good web – some challenges and strategies to realise it</strong>".
<div class="read-more"><a href="/keynotes/#luciano-floridi">Read more</a></div>
</div>

</div><div class="spacer right-righthalf"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/Keynotes/lorrie-faith-cranor.jpg" title="Lorrie Faith Cranor" alt="Lorrie Faith Cranor"/>

<div>
Welcome to our keynote speaker <strong>Lorrie Faith Cranor</strong>. Her presentation will be "<strong>Web Privacy and Security: The User Experience</strong>".
<div class="read-more"><a href="/keynotes/#lorrie-faith-cranor">Read more</a></div>
</div>
</div><div class="spacer right-lefthalf"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/Keynotes/ruhi-sarikaya-full.jpg" title="Ruhi Sarikaya" alt="Ruhi Sarikaya"/>

<div>
Welcome to our keynote speaker <strong>Ruhi Sarikaya</strong>, Director of Applied Science, Amazon Alexa.<br/>The title of his talk will be "<strong>Conversational AI for Interacting with Digital and Physical World</strong>".
<div class="read-more"><a href="/keynotes/#ruhi-sarikaya">Read more</a></div>
</div></div><div class="spacer right-righthalf"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/Keynotes/FrontKeynotesBig.jpg" title="BIG keynotes announce'" alt="BIG keynotes announce"/>

<div>
The <a href="/program/the-big-web-track/">BIG Web track</a> keynotes' talks are &laquo;<span class="stronger">Fairness in Data Analysis and Algorithms</span>&raquo; by <strong>Jon Kleinberg</strong>.<br/> 
and &laquo;<span class="stronger">Big data epidemiology: more than forecast</span>&raquo; by <strong>Alessandro Vespignani</strong>.
<div class="read-more spaced1"><a href="/big-keynotes/">Read more</a></div>
</div></div></div><div class="clearall"></div>      </div>
      <div>
        <div id="home-headlines" class="rightblock"><h1><a href="/headlines/"><span class="begin">Our<br/>Latest</span><span>Headlines</span></a></h1><div class="spacer right-lefthalf"><div class="post-date smaller">12 March 2018 - 20:35</div><img src="/wp-content/uploads/News/Headline-Panels.png" alt="Plenary Panels announce"/>

<div>
The detailed program of the <a href="/plenary-panels/">Plenary Panels</a> to be held on Thursday and Friday morning at TheWebConf 2018 is now published.
</div></div><div class="spacer right-righthalf"><div class="post-date smaller">3 March 2018 - 12:23</div><img src="/wp-content/uploads/News/Contact-news.png" alt="Contact News"/>

<div>
If you need information, please visit the <strong>Participate</strong> menu, or the <a href="/conference-faq/">Conference FAQ</a> page, or select an email address on our <a href="/about/contacts">Contacts page</a>.
</div></div><div class="clearall bottom-spaced"></div><div class="spacer right-lefthalf"><div class="post-date smaller">2 March 2018 - 21:20</div><img src="/wp-content/uploads/News/Headline-JobFair.png" alt="Job Fair announce"/>

<div>
<strong>The Web Conference</strong> is happy to announce the first edition of its <a href="/job-fair/">Job Fair</a>.
</div></div><div class="spacer right-righthalf"><div class="post-date smaller">27 February 2018 - 15:16</div><img src="/wp-content/uploads/News/sessions-details.png" alt="Sessions Details Announce"/>

<div>
The <a href="/research-sessions-details/">details of Research tracks sessions</a> of <strong>The Web Conference 2018</strong> in Lyon are now published.

    <div class="clearall fullspacer"></div>
    <div class="clearall right-leftthird">
      <img class="statusimg" src="/wp-content/uploads/Pictos/hex-keynotes.png" alt="2012 keynotes"/>
    </div>
    <div class="right-right2third statustext">
      TRUE <span class="statusbold">VISIONARY</span><br/>
      KEYNOTE<br/>
      <span class="statusbold">SPEAKERS</span>
    </div>
    <div class="clearall statuscomment">
      <span class="statusbold">In 2012, Lyon hosted:</span>
      <ul class="statuslist">
        <li>Neelie Kroes about Net Neutrality,</li>
        <li>Tim Berners-Lee about Privacy,</li>
        <li>Chris Welty about A.I.</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<div>
<div class="leftwide">
<h1><span class="begin">About</span><span>The Web Conference</span></h1>
<p>The International World Wide Web Conference Committee (IW3C2), is the organization that manages The Web Conference (former WWW Conference) series. This series aims to provide the world a premier forum for discussion and debate about the evolution of the Web, the standardization of its associated technologies, and the impact of those technologies on society and culture.</p>
</div>
<div class="rightnarrow">
<img src="/wp-content/uploads/ThisSite/golden-gate.jpg" alt="Golden Gate Bridge"/>
<div class="perthcomment">After Perth, Western Australia in 2017 and Lyon, France in 2018...</div>
<div class="sfocomment">The Web Conference 2019 will be held in the silicon valley, California.</div>
</div>
</div>
